authentication.errorMessage: An error occured while logging in. Please try again

networkError.message: Login error: Check your network connection or try again later

authentication.noRightsCreateEvent: You have insufficient rights to create events.
authentication.noRightsPublishEvent: You have insufficient rights to publish events.
authentication.noRightsUpdateEvent: You have insufficient rights to edit events.

accessibility.statusMessage: {{count}} option is available, use up and down arrow keys to navigate. Press Enter key to select.
accessibility.statusMessage_plural: {{count}} options are available, use up and down arrow keys to navigate. Press Enter key to select.

feedback.text: Give feedback and make an impact

imageUploader.buttonDropImage: Drop an image into the area or add from your computer by clicking
imageUploader.tooLargeFileSize: File size is too large. Maximum file size is {{maxSize}} MB

errors.authorizationRequired: Sign in to perform this action
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this operation.
errors.validationError: There are errors on the form. Please check the form.

cancelEventModal.text1: This action cancels the event. You can also postpone the event, or delete an event that you entered accidentally.
cancelEventModal.text2: The following events will be cancelled:
cancelEventModal.title: Cancel event
cancelEventModal.warning: Remember that instead of canceling, you can also host the event remotely online. In this case, use the edit form to select Internet as the venue. You can also postpone the event to the future.

deleteEventModal.text1: This function permanently deletes the event.
deleteEventModal.text2: If necessary, you can also cancel or postpone the event.
deleteEventModal.text3: The following events will be deleted:
deleteEventModal.title: Delete event

buttonAddImage.course: Add a photo or video of the course
buttonAddImage.event: Add a photo or video of the event

form.checkboxIsVerified: I verify that the information I have provided is correct and I undertake to comply with all instructions and regulations concerning the courses and events of the City of Helsinki.
form.helperUmbrellaEvent: Note. An umbrella event must be created before you can add subevents to it.

eventOnly.course: Image may be used only for this course
eventOnly.event: Image may be used only for this event

image.placeholderAltText: Enter image alt text for screen readers
image.titleImportFromHardDisk: Import new image from your hard disk

form.infoTextAttendeeCapacity: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit ut aliquam

infoTextAudience.course: If the course does not have a specific target group, don't select anything
infoTextAudience.event: If the event does not have a specific target group, don't select anything

form.infoTextAudienceAge: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit ut aliquam
form.infoTextDescription: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit ut aliquam
form.infoTextEnrolmentTime: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit ut aliquam

infoTextEventTimes1.course: To add a multi-day recurring course, there is an “Add New Time” button and a regular “Recurring Course” tool for a regularly recurring course.
infoTextEventTimes1.event: To add a multi-day recurring event, there is an “Add New Time” button and a regular “Recurring Event” tool for a regularly recurring event.

infoTextEventTimes2.course: Enter the start date of the course and also the start time if the course starts at a specific time.
infoTextEventTimes2.event: Enter the start date of the event and also the start time if the event starts at a specific time.

infoTextEventTimes3.course: Also enter the end date as well as the end time if the course ends at a specific time.
infoTextEventTimes3.event: Also enter the end date as well as the end time if the event ends at a specific time.

infoTextEventTimes4.course: If the course is held more than once, you can add new dates to the course. If the course repeats regularly, you can add all times at once by selecting Recurring Course.
infoTextEventTimes4.event: If the event is held more than once, you can add new dates to the event. If the event repeats regularly, you can add all times at once by selecting Recurring Event.

infoTextEventTimes5.course: To delete an extra time, select the trash can icon next to the time.
infoTextEventTimes5.event: To delete an extra time, select the trash can icon next to the time.

infoTextImage1.course: Optional. Always try to find a picture for the course. The image can be marked CC 4.0 BY (see explanation) or "use only in connection with the course ". Some freely usable illustrations can be found at hel.fi/tapahtumakuvat.
infoTextImage1.event: Optional. Always try to find a picture for the event. The image can be marked CC 4.0 BY (see explanation) or "use only in connection with the event ". Some freely usable illustrations can be found at hel.fi/tapahtumakuvat.

form.infoTextImage2: Before uploading, edit the image to fit the network and to a 3: 2 horizontal aspect ratio, such as 1200 × 800px. It is essential that the file size remains reasonable for mobile use as well, preferably less than 200 kilobytes (kb).
form.infoTextImage3: Give the image or video a name and briefly describe what is happening in it.

infoTextInfoLanguages.course: Select the languages used for entering course information.
infoTextInfoLanguages.event: Select the languages used for entering event information.

infoTextInLanguages.course: Choose the languages used in the course.
infoTextInLanguages.event: Choose the languages used in the event.

infoTextKeywords.course: Attach at least one keyword to the course that describes the theme of the course. Start typing a keyword and select the keyword you want to add from the list below.
infoTextKeywords.event: Attach at least one keyword to the event that describes the theme of the event. Start typing a keyword and select the keyword you want to add from the list below.

form.infoTextLocation1: Enter the name or street address of the venue in the field and select the correct venue from the list.

infoTextLocation2.course: If the course is only held remotely on the Internet, select Internet as the venue. The event URL is entered in the home page field and / or the event on social media fields.
infoTextLocation2.event: If the event is only held remotely on the Internet, select Internet as the venue. The event URL is entered in the home page field and / or the event on social media fields.

form.infoTextLocation3: If the venue is found in the list, its location does not need to be described separately. However, you can provide additional information to find the venue, such as the floor number or classroom name.
form.infoTextLocation4: If the exact venue is not found in the list, select the nearest street address as the venue and enter the name of the venue or other detailed arrival instructions in the additional information field.
form.infoTextMainCategories: Please select at least one main category

infoTextOffers1.course: Indicate if the course is free. Enter the price for the chargeable course in the form “5€”.
infoTextOffers1.event: Indicate if the event is free. Enter the price for the chargeable event in the form “5€”.

infoTextOffers2.course: If the course has several prices, click “Add new price information” and enter the name of each price group (e.g. Children) in the Description of price information field.
infoTextOffers2.event: If the event has several prices, click “Add new price information” and enter the name of each price group (e.g. Children) in the Description of price information field.

form.infoTextProvider: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

infoTextSocialMedia.course: Optional. In the URL field, enter the SoMe links for the course.
infoTextSocialMedia.event: Optional. In the URL field, enter the SoMe links for the event.

form.infoTextType1: Select the type of event. Is it an event or a course? The event is a one-time event and starts at a specific time, while the course may, as a rule, have several occurrences.
form.infoTextType2: The choice of event type affects the choices made later in the input form.
form.infoTextUmrellaEvent: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
form.infoTextUmbrellaSubEvent: If you wish to add this event under an umbrella event, you may do so from the associated

labelProvider.event: Event organizer {{langText}} (if different than the publisher)

notificationTitleImage.event: Image or video related to the event

placeholderAudienceMaxAge.event: Enter the maximum age for the event

placeholderAudienceMinAge.event: Enter the minimum age for the event

placeholderDescription.event: Enter a description of the event

placeholderInfoUrl.event: Enter the URL of the event home page

form.placeholderOfferInfoUrl: Enter the URL for the ticket sale or registration {{langText}}

form.tooltipEventIsUmbrella: A sub event cannot be an umbrella event.

postponeEventModal.text1: This function postpones the event to the future. After postponing, you can later enter a new time for the event.
postponeEventModal.text2: The following events will be postponed:
postponeEventModal.title: Postpone event

updateEventModal.text1: Data is stored for all events in this series. Changes to these events will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
updateEventModal.text2: The data is updated in the following events
updateEventModal.title: Save event

array.min_plural: At least {{min}} item must be selected
array.required: At least 1 item must be selected

date.future: This date must be in the future

logoutPage.text: You have been logged out of the service. Log back in or return to the home page.

notFound.text: The content you were looking for could not be found. Log in or return to the home page.
